price: Warra kafaraniif guyyaa isaanii kan beellama godhaman keessatti badiin isaaniif mirkanaa’eera.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
